name: Primal Outer Orbit Priorities
description:
What do you do when you gotta go but your toilet's clogged? Well raid a space pirate junker ship of course.

Fly across trash littered space in an attempt to find the key to your relief.

WASD - Directional Hovering , Space - Hover up,  Ctrl - Hover Down

RMB - Grab Items 

LMB - Throw grabbed item

We all have our primal priorities, so before you judge someone for doing something crazy never forget that we're not all that different. 

THIS GAME RUNS BEST ON GAMING PC'S/LAPTOPS.

Credits:

Art, Level and Design: Jose Estrada

Programming: David Li, Nathaniel Strand

Junker Ship Concept Art: Zachary Olson
